name: INShareFocusStatusIntentResponseCode
desc: A constant that indicates your app’s ability to handle an intent to share the user’s focus status.

items.name: case ready
items.desc: Your intent handler is ready to handle the intent.

items.name: case success
items.desc: Your intent handler successfully updated the user’s communication status.

items.name: case inProgress
items.desc: Your intent handler is handling the intent, but it may take some time.

items.name: case failure
items.desc: Your intent handler is unable to handle the intent.

items.name: case failureRequiringAppLaunch
items.desc: The user needs to launch your app to update their focus status.
